resources.string: Browse is where you can find sources/extensions
The download buttons in the extensions list, allow you to download extensions which will be used to get anime from the corresponding site
To browse the catalogue of a given source, click anywhere on that source\'s row (excluding the settings icon)
WebView is required for AnimeDL for certain providers
:monkethreat: Your library is empty, go to the [sources] tab and find an anime to add to the library.
:monkethreat: To keep track of your watch progress add an anime to the library!
:monkethreat: Ahoy! Don\'t just stand there! You must add an anime to the library first!
:monkecry: It looks like no anime with that name was found, please try searching with another name.
:monkecry: You are out of luch chief, no such anime was found.
:monkecry: It looks like what you were looking for...can't be...found.
:monkewhat: It looks like this anime does not exist, maybe it was removed from the source?
:monkewhat: That\'s weird, this should have not happened,\nthe only logical cause is that the anime was either removed from the source,\nor it was relocated to another page.
:monkewhat: Now that was unexpected! Try refreshing, it might help!
:monkthink: Weird...all the extensions are gone, try checking your connection status.
:monkthink: Well that\'s embarashing...you weren\'t supposed to see this message...
